Instance.description: This interaction allows the player to have a Sim 'license' a song they wrote for the purpose of making money. There is a license interaction per instrument type and the Sim can license one song per instrument at a time. Once the time expires, controlled by a commodity, the Sim can license another song of that type.

Tunable.description: Which music styles are available for this interaction. This should be only the Written Music Style for the particular instrument.
